author: Sam Reynolds, AI Boost
title: Asia Morning Briefing: Michael Saylor Downplays BTC's Quantum Threat
description: The Bitcoin network will eventually do a software upgrade that will nullify the quantum threat to BTC, Strategy's Michael Saylor recently said on CNBC.
content: Welcome to Asia Morning Briefing, a daily summary of top stories during U.S. hours and an overview of market moves and analysis. For a detailed overview of U.S. markets, see CoinDesk's Crypto Daybook… [+6318 chars]
